word: Overeating Produced Forgetfulness and Loss of Memory (counsel to a gourmand).--You are a gourmand when at the table. This is one great cause of your forgetfulness and loss of memory. You say things which I know you have said, and then turn square about and say that you said something entirely different. I knew this, but passed it over as the sure result of overeating. Of what use would it be to speak about it? It would not cure the evil.--Lt 17, 1895. (CD 138.)
